duties_responsibilities.duty: Safely and efficiently operate a tractor-trailer and manually unload/deliver various products to customer locations on an assigned route schedule.
Build relationships with each customer using a positive, friendly attitude and become familiar with their operations to meet needs and expectations.
Adhere to pre-established delivery routes and develop good working knowledge of product and inventory.
Complete transportation and delivery paperwork as required.
Maintain ongoing job skills and adhere to safety guidelines.

education_certification.credential: Valid Class A Commercial Driver License (CDL)
